title: Sun Valley Reveals a New Billionaire Dress Code
sub_head: Barry Diller in Day-Glo Dior? The Allen & Co. summit known for behind-the-scenes deals may have entered its look-at-me moment.
body:
A Dior logo? At Sun Valley? It’s a backroom merger few saw coming.
On Tuesday, IAC Chairman Barry Diller surfaced at Allen & Co.’s annual conference in Sun Valley, Idaho, wearing a jaunty floral Dior shirt with a “Weekend at Bernie’s” vibe. The shirt, a version of which is currently selling on The RealReal for $1,495, bucked the traditional Sun Valley style of mundane business casual.
